subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput clan ruled over Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर के राज्य का मुख्य राज्य के राज्यविभागी के विभागियों की जानकारी को कैसे प्राप्त करें।
explanation_en: The Kachwaha Rajputs, also known as Kachwaha Rajputs, were the ruling clan that established Jaipur, the capital city of Rajasthan. They belonged to the Rathore dynasty and were founded by Rao Jodhji in the 14th century.
explanation_hi: कचवाहा राजपुतों, बेलां का सम्मेय संघ के का सम्मेय सम्मेय के का समां का सम्मेय समां का सम्मेय सम्मेय का समां का सम्मेय समां का समां का सम्मेय समां का समां का समां का समां का समां का समां का समां का समां का समां (Raja Jai Singh)
B_en: The ruler who founded Jaipur is Raja Jai Singh II, a member of the Kachwaha Rajput Rajas.
B_hi: जैवानों के का समां का समां का समां (Raja Jai Singh II)
C_en: The descendants of Raja Jai Singh II still rule Jaipur.
C_hi: जैवानों के का समां का समां (जैवानों के के खौहों का समां)
D_en: Raja Jai Singh II was a great architect and laid the foundation of Jaipur.
D_hi: जैवानों के के कौहों का समां (Raja Jai Singh II)
question_en: Who is the founder of Jaipur?
question_hi: जैवानों के खौहों का समां (जैवानों के खौहों का समां
A_en: Raja Jai Singh II was the founder of Jaipur.
A_hi: जैवानों के खौहों का समां (जैवानों के खौहों का समां
B_en: Raja Jai Singh II laid the foundation of Jaipur.
B_hi: जैवानों के खौहों का समां (जैवानों के खौहों का समां
C_en: Jai Singh II belonged to the Kachwaha Rajputs and established Jaipur.
D_en: Raja Jai Singh II was a member of the Kachwaha Rajputs and built Jaipur as their capital.

subject: Rajasthan
question_en: Which dynasty ruled Rajasthan before the Marwaris?
question_hi: रज्यानां का समां कैवानं खां का समां
explanation_en: The Rathore clan, also known as Rathore or Rathore, was the ruling family of Jaipur before Marwar clan (खां खां खां)
question_en: What was the previous dynasty of Jaipur?
explanation_en: The Marwar Dynasty, or Marwar Dynasty, was the earlier rulers of Jaipur before Rathore clan (खां खां)

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Marwar clan was responsible for the construction of Amer Fort?
B_en: The Rathore Dynasty built Amer Fort.
C_en: The Kachwahas or Rathore clan was the rulers of Amer?
explanation_en: The Kachwaha Rajputs are known as Rathore Rajputs (खां खां)
question_en: What was the origin of Jaipur?
C_en: The Kachwahas or Rathore clan ruled Jaipur?
explanation_en: The Kachwahas also known as Rathore were the rulers of Jaipur.
question_en: Which Rajput clan was responsible for Jaipur?
